get_poll_meta: SELECT poll_id, title, description, credits, created_at FROM polls WHERE visible=1 ORDER BY poll_id DESC
post_poll_meta: INSERT INTO polls (title, description, credits) VALUES (:title, :description, :credits) RETURNING poll_id
delete_poll: UPDATE polls SET visible=0 WHERE poll_id=:id
get_poll_statements: SELECT question_id, header, description FROM questions WHERE poll_id=:id
post_poll_statement: INSERT INTO questions (poll_id, header, description) VALUES (:poll_id, :header, :description)
register_user: INSERT INTO users (email, password, firstname, lastname) VALUES (:email, :password, :firstname, :lastname)
get_user: SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE email=:email
